short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into a cozy, magical world with the Ghibli Coffee Shop Live Wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspired by the whimsical atmosphere of Studio Ghibli films, this Chrome extension brings the warmth and charm of a quaint coffee shop to your new tab. With soft lighting, delicious beverages, and enchanting details, it's the perfect backdrop for anyone who loves the serene beauty of Ghibli-style animation.

‚òï A cozy Ghibli-inspired coffee shop live wallpaper that captures the magic of the beloved studio.
üåê Customizable search bar to use your preferred search engine.
üïí Clock and date display to keep you on schedule.
üîó Quick-access shortcuts for easy navigation to your favorite websites.
Bring the charm of a Ghibli coffee shop to your browser, and enjoy the peaceful ambiance every time you open a new tab.
